sys:positions.title: Member of Provincial Assembly of Sudurpashchim Province
Member of Constituent Assembly of Nepal

description: Bir Man Chaudhari is a Nepalese politician affiliated with the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist). As of 2017, he is an incumbent Member of the Provincial Assembly of Sudurpashchim Province, representing Kailali 3(A). He was previously a member of the Constituent Assembly of Nepal from 2008 to 2013, having been elected from the Kailali-3 constituency with 19,739 votes.
short_description: Nepali politician, belonging to the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) and current Member of Sudurpaschim Provincial Assembly.
